text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, atrivim, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn kɨ nɨ mɨkɨmamin akamɨn gɨn mangam:4:27 Gumazir maba ghaze, vezɨn kam, a dughiar Nebukatnesar uam atrivimɨn otivamim a mɨgeir puvatɨ. Me ghaze, Daniel kamaghɨn mɨkeme, atrivim arazir aghuibar amutɨ, bizir kurar kaba a bativan kogham. Nɨ arazir kurabar amuan koghɨva, arazir aghuibar amu, egh gumazamizir onganarazibar apangkuf. Nɨ kamaghɨn damuva, egh nɨ ti deraghvɨra ikɨtɨ, bizir nɨ amiba bar deravɨram otivam.”
